verses.verse: And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> of shittim <S%H7848><s%> wood, <S%H6086><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> long, <S%H753><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> broad; <S%H7341><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> foursquare: <S%H7251><s%> and the height <S%H6967><s%> thereof shall be three <S%H7969><s%> cubits. <S%H520><s%>

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> the horns <S%H7161><s%> of it upon <S%H5921><s%> the four <S%H702><s%> corners <S%H6438><s%> thereof: his horns <S%H7161><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the same: and thou shalt overlay <S%H6823><s%> it with brass. <S%H5178><s%>

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> his pans <S%H5518><s%> to receive his ashes, <S%H1878><s%> and his shovels, <S%H3257><s%> and his basins, <S%H4219><s%> and his fleshhooks, <S%H4207><s%> and his firepans: <S%H4289><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the vessels <S%H3627><s%> thereof thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> of brass. <S%H5178><s%>

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> for it a grate <S%H4345><s%> of network <S%H4639><s%> <S%H7568><s%> of brass; <S%H5178><s%> and upon <S%H5921><s%> the net <S%H7568><s%> shalt thou make <S%H6213><s%> four <S%H702><s%> brazen <S%H5178><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> in <S%H5921><s%> the four <S%H702><s%> corners <S%H7098><s%> thereof.

And thou shalt put <S%H5414><s%> it under <S%H8478><s%> the compass <S%H3749><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> beneath, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4295><s%> that the net <S%H7568><s%> may be <S%H1961><s%> even to <S%H5704><s%> the midst <S%H2677><s%> of the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> staves <S%H905><s%> for the altar, <S%H4196><s%> staves <S%H905><s%> of shittim <S%H7848><s%> wood, <S%H6086><s%> and overlay <S%H6823><s%> them with brass. <S%H5178><s%>

And <S%H853><s%> the staves <S%H905><s%> shall be put <S%H935><s%> into the rings, <S%H2885><s%> and the staves <S%H905><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> sides <S%H6763><s%> of the altar, <S%H4196><s%> to bear <S%H5375><s%> it.

Hollow <S%H5014><s%> with boards <S%H3871><s%> shalt thou make <S%H6213><s%> it: as <S%H834><s%> it was showed <S%H7200><s%> thee in the mount, <S%H2022><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> shall they make <S%H6213><s%> it.

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> the court <S%H2691><s%> of the tabernacle: <S%H4908><s%> for the south <S%H5045><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> southward <S%H8486><s%> there shall be hangings <S%H7050><s%> for the court <S%H2691><s%> of fine twined linen <S%H8336><s%> <S%H7806><s%> of a hundred <S%H3967><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> long <S%H753><s%> for one <S%H259><s%> side: <S%H6285><s%>

And the twenty <S%H6242><s%> pillars <S%H5982><s%> thereof and their twenty <S%H6242><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> shall be of brass; <S%H5178><s%> the hooks <S%H2053><s%> of the pillars <S%H5982><s%> and their fillets <S%H2838><s%> shall be of silver. <S%H3701><s%>

And likewise <S%H3651><s%> for the north <S%H6828><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> in length <S%H753><s%> there shall be hangings <S%H7050><s%> of a hundred <S%H3967><s%> cubits long, <S%H753><s%> and his twenty <S%H6242><s%> pillars <S%H5982><s%> and their twenty <S%H6242><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> of brass; <S%H5178><s%> the hooks <S%H2053><s%> of the pillars <S%H5982><s%> and their fillets <S%H2838><s%> of silver. <S%H3701><s%>

And for the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> on the west <S%H3220><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> shall be hangings <S%H7050><s%> of fifty <S%H2572><s%> cubits: <S%H520><s%> their pillars <S%H5982><s%> ten, <S%H6235><s%> and their sockets <S%H134><s%> ten. <S%H6235><s%>
And the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> on the east <S%H6924><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> eastward <S%H4217><s%> shall be fifty <S%H2572><s%> cubits. <S%H520><s%>

The hangings <S%H7050><s%> of one side <S%H3802><s%> of the gate shall be fifteen <S%H2568><s%> <S%H6240><s%> cubits: <S%H520><s%> their pillars <S%H5982><s%> three, <S%H7969><s%> and their sockets <S%H134><s%> three. <S%H7969><s%>

And on the other <S%H8145><s%> side <S%H3802><s%> shall be hangings <S%H7050><s%> fifteen <S%H2568><s%> <S%H6240><s%> cubits: their pillars <S%H5982><s%> three, <S%H7969><s%> and their sockets <S%H134><s%> three. <S%H7969><s%>

And for the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> shall be a hanging <S%H4539><s%> of twenty <S%H6242><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> of blue, <S%H8504><s%> and purple, <S%H713><s%> and scarlet, <S%H8438><s%> <S%H8144><s%> and fine twined linen, <S%H8336><s%> <S%H7806><s%> wrought with needlework: <S%H4639><s%> <S%H7551><s%> and their pillars <S%H5982><s%> shall be four, <S%H702><s%> and their sockets <S%H134><s%> four. <S%H702><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the pillars <S%H5982><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> the court <S%H2691><s%> shall be filleted <S%H2836><s%> with silver; <S%H3701><s%> their hooks <S%H2053><s%> shall be of silver, <S%H3701><s%> and their sockets <S%H134><s%> of brass. <S%H5178><s%>

The length <S%H753><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> shall be a hundred <S%H3967><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> and the breadth <S%H7341><s%> fifty every where, <S%H2572><s%> <S%H2572><s%> and the height <S%H6967><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> of fine twined linen, <S%H8336><s%> <S%H7806><s%> and their sockets <S%H134><s%> of brass. <S%H5178><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> the service <S%H5656><s%> thereof, and all <S%H3605><s%> the pins <S%H3489><s%> thereof, and all <S%H3605><s%> the pins <S%H3489><s%> of the court, <S%H2691><s%> shall be of brass. <S%H5178><s%>

And thou <S%H859><s%> shalt command <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that they bring <S%H3947><s%> <S%H413><s%> thee pure <S%H2134><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> olive <S%H2132><s%> beaten <S%H3795><s%> for the light, <S%H3974><s%> to cause the lamp <S%H5216><s%> to burn <S%H5927><s%> always. <S%H8548><s%>

In the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> without <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the veil, <S%H6532><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is before <S%H5921><s%> the testimony, <S%H5715><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> shall order <S%H6186><s%> it from evening <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6153><s%> to <S%H5704><s%> morning <S%H1242><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> it shall be a statute <S%H2708><s%> forever <S%H5769><s%> unto their generations <S%H1755><s%> on the behalf <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
